author: bencomic

left.text: see, you cleaned him by rubbing your hands with salt and stroking his feathers with it. he liked it

right.text: did he use his wings or what?

left.text: the weirdest thing wasn't the salt, but the fact that the first thing they do with a parrot that can't fly is teach him to play the drums.

right.text: i wonder if Salty would be good at beatmania...

left.text: no, he danced on top of the drums. bass snare bass snare bass snare snaresnare

title: i'll find out where you live, salty (part 2)
